Articles.Content: Due to trying various rocket/plane designs, my Kerbals have to bail out and while I can get the Kerbals RCS to work, I cannot seem to find a way to open a parachute for the individual Kerbal.   I don't even see a control setting for it.  Are they just not in the game yet?  Thanks.
Yes, I fell for this one too (pun intended).  I don’t think they are implemented yet.  I certainly can't find them if they are.
